actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of certain public domain lands to a State in any case in which land in such State has been designated as wilderness.

summary.text: Endangered American Natural Resource Act - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey public domain land of the United States to each State in which an area is designated as wilderness. States that the public domain land to be conveyed shall be equal in acreage to the total acreage designated as wilderness in such State.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of certain public domain lands to a State in any case in which land in such State has been designated as wilderness.
